packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Firmware
packages.summary: Firmware for an environmental/utility monitoring RTU gateway with 4G and Ethernet connectivity, integrated PLC logic and I/O.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-RTOS
packages.summary: Embedded real-time OS running on a 32-bit MCU to support deterministic acquisition and control.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-I-O-and-Sensor-Manager
packages.summary: Manager for analog/digital I/O, serial interfaces and sensor channels (e.g., flow, pressure, level, temperature, humidity, gas, power).

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Programmable-Logic-and-Timers
packages.summary: Integrated PLC-style logic, timers and scheduling for local automation, alarms and remote control actions.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Communication-Subsystem
packages.summary: 4G LTE / NB-IoT, Ethernet and SMS communication stack with periodic reporting, change-of-value reporting and remote control.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Protocol-Stacks
packages.summary: Modbus RTU/TCP, MQTT and HTTP(S) protocol stacks for integration with SCADA, IoT platforms and supervisory systems.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Video-and-Image-Module
packages.summary: Optional module for capturing and transmitting images or video from connected cameras at monitoring sites.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Alarm-and-Notification-Engine
packages.summary: Threshold and rule-based alarm engine with multi-recipient notification (e.g., SMS, email, platform alerts) when environmental parameters exceed limits.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Cloud-and-Server-Connectors
packages.summary: Connectors to environmental monitoring platforms and utility SCADA/telemetry servers for centralized visualization and control.

packages.name: Env-Utility-Monitoring-Gateway-1-Security-and-Device-Management
packages.summary: Security mechanisms (encryption, authentication) and remote device management including configuration and firmware upgrades.
